text: In summary, MP-12 mutants encoding NSs of PTV or SFSV are highly efficacious in mice and encode a DIVA marker, while rMP12-PTNSs also replicates efficiently in MRC-5 cells, which is useful for the vaccine manufacturing process. The immunogenicity and safety profile of rMP12-PTVNSs in ruminants and nonhuman primates will need to be tested to develop this virus as an alternative of MP-12 vaccine for veterinary and human use, respectively.
